mapper.select: select A.thing_id, B.title, count(A.thing_id) as count from b_order A join b_thing B on A.thing_id=B.id group by A.thing_id order by count desc;
select B.title, count(B.title) as count from b_thing A join B_classification B on A.classification_id = B.id group by B.title order by count desc limit 5;

select re_ip, count(re_ip) as count from b_op_log
re_time like CONCAT('%',#{day},'%')
group by re_ip
